articles.title: 2 Hot Stocks to Buy and Hold Until You Retire
articles.content: Apple and Amazon are dominating high-growth areas that are likely to offer significant gains over the long term.

articles.title: The S&P 500 Has Grown Top-Heavy. Here's Why That's a Problem.
articles.content: Apple and Microsoft are doing the heavy lifting within the S&P 500 -- which could leave some investors in a tricky spot.

articles.title: Warren Buffett Doesn't Diversify Investments Across Stocks. Should You?
articles.content: More than 90% of Buffett's holdings are concentrated in a few sectors.
